positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Symbiont has developed the market-leading platform for institutional applications of blockchain technology. Financial institutions and governments are working with Symbiont to develop new business lines, increase transparency, reduce risk, and save costs

positions.title: Lead Engineer
positions.description:
Worked directly with world-class doctors in order to develop a product that allows doctors and radiologists to annotate x-ray images in order to produce a pathology dataset for supervised machine learning for the in-house computer vision system
Developed and maintained backend infrastructure that ingested raw x-ray images and metadata from hospitals, percolated, normalized and enriched the image data resulting in fully-prepared dataset for a trainer/classifier to consume
Prepared the products for the FDA approval
Supported computer vision scientists to productize their prototypes, introduce better engineering practices into their designs
Helped creating and enforcing SDLC and other processes to ensure necessary compliance for the FDA approval
Actively participated in hiring, doctor training, and promoting the business

…
see more

given.text:
Alex and I worked together at Gust for about two years. He found an especially helpful niche in identifying and implementing a number of internal development tools which continue to simplify and expedite our daily processes. He also left an indelible mark on a number of his fellow developers by introducing us to functional programming, notably Erlang and Haskell. His insight and excitement around these languages has inspired us to learn and consider implementation techniques from new perspectives which has had a brilliant effect on our programming style. I would happily work with Alex again.
…
See more

We partnered with Alex Babkin to work on the Notesolution website, where he assumed the role of lead developer. Alex made it very clear what the technical limitations are, and created a plan that brought Notesolution to the users fast and with the most important features. I can't wait to work with Alex again.
Alex is a keen software developer with significant expertise derived from self-driven software and firmware projects as well as extensive work experience.
Alex is a reliable talented colleague, once committed achieving his goals. Fluent in the embedded, GPU, 3D and system level field, he also succeeded in complex software systems and is self motivated.

received.text: Alex has proven to be a reliable startup partner and a bright and respectful coworker, who contributed numerous creative solutions to the company's efforts.

Alex Karasyov's insight of developing web based applications is what brought us to work together on the Notesolution website. He made sure that the development progress was in tune with business requirements and delivered the project on time and on budget.

items: Serverless web framework for AWS in Haskell
